edited_stories.edited_story_text: A big storm was coming. People were busy fueling their cars for evacuation. Newsmen were interviewing locals. Business owners were boarding up their storefronts. The police were prepared for anything.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: Today was the day of the big race. There were a lot of people there even though it was in a tsunami evacuation area! There were reporters there too and one of them interviewed me! Everyone was happy to see us and the area felt very safe with all the police nearby. I had a great time!
